llm.title: AI ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆ
llm.test_hint: Runs a quick prompt to verify your API key and model.
llm.model_hint: Choose a model that supports image input (vision). Text-only models will fail analysis.

telemetry.title: Telemetry
telemetry.desc: Optional, anonymous usage telemetry to help improve YA-WAMF. Disabled by default.
telemetry.privacy_notice: No images, clips, audio, detection content, usernames, emails, or API keys are collected.
telemetry.includes_value: Model type, enabled integrations, notification channels, enrichment mode, access flags
telemetry.geography_value: Approx. country derived from request headers (IP not stored)
telemetry.appreciation_tooltip: If you can, please enable telemetry. It helps me understand how YA-WAMF is used and guides improvements.

notifications.enable_notify_hint: Notifications are currently off. Enable "Notify on new detections" or "Notify on updates" to send any alerts.

data.title: Data Management
data.auto_cleanup_note: Automatic cleanup runs daily at 3 AM
data.backfill_desc: Query Frigate history to fetch and classify past events.
data.batch_analysis_long_desc: Run video analysis on all detections labeled as "Unknown Bird". This will queue background tasks to download clips and re-classify them.
data.batch_analysis_circuit_open: Circuit Breaker Open (Paused due to failures)
data.cache_cleanup_success: Cache cleanup complete! Deleted {snapshots} snapshots, {clips} clips ({freed} freed).

security.title: Security
security.https_warning: Security Warning: Authentication is enabled over HTTP. Your credentials may be exposed. Use HTTPS in production.

enrichment.title: Enrichment Sources
enrichment.fallback_note: Fallbacks apply when a provider cannot supply a field.

detection.floor_help: Events below this floor are ignored completely. Events between floor and threshold are saved as "Unknown Bird".
detection.trust_frigate_desc: Skip internal classification if Frigate identified species
detection.auto_video_desc: Automatically run deep video reclassification for every event
detection.video_retry_note: Retries use exponential backoff to wait for Frigate clip finalization.
detection.naming_scientific_sub: Only show scientific names. Hides common names.

ai.conversation_empty: No conversation yet. Ask a follow-up question to the AI.

error.boundary_subtitle: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
